code: import{ADD_ITEM,MOVE_ITEM,REMOVE_ITEM}from"../types";export var addItem=function addItem(obj,category){return{type:ADD_ITEM,payload:{obj:obj,category:category}};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(timestamp,category){return{type:REMOVE_ITEM,payload:{timestamp:timestamp,category:category}};};export var moveItem=function moveItem(obj,targetCategory){return{type:MOVE_ITEM,payload:{obj:obj,targetCategory:targetCategory}};};
